make your property a preferred destination

As a strategic partner to large operations with a food and beverage component, Playground Hospitality collaborates with business, sports and leisure destinations to develop on-site dining operations that elevate your brand.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/case-study/camp-social/” button_text=”See How We’ve Done It” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.5.1″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Best Beans” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Best Beans Row” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”1200px” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”5vh||5vh||false|false” make_fullwidth=”on”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.5.1″ custom_padding=”|||5%|false|false” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Tittle” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Nunito||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_text_align=”center” header_3_font=”Oswald|||on|||||” header_3_font_size=”42px” header_3_letter_spacing=”2px” header_3_line_height=”1.5em” max_width=”600px” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”|||” locked=”off”]

Invent a new game

Players adapt when the rules change. We’ve seen dramatic shifts before and can help you adjust.

Keep yourself in the hospitality game with an exceptional take-out and delivery experience. We help burnish your brand beyond the walls of your restaurant.

Restaurants are changing. Expect limited menus, smaller dining areas and an intense focus on air circulation and purification.

Our industry depends on keeping staff and guests safe. Let Playground Hospitality show you how to win guests back.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/what-we-do/#new_concepts” button_text=”See How We’ve Done It” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ button_icon_color=”#8300e9″ custom_margin=”24px|||||”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.5.1″ background_enable_image=”off” background_position=”top_left” custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/image-2.png” title_text=”image (2)” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”683px” custom_padding=”||0px|||”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.5.3″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.5.3″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.5.3″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/pexels-skitterphoto-38070-scaled.jpg” title_text=”pexels-skitterphoto-38070″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” admin_label=”Image” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.5.3″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Tittle” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ text_font=”Nunito||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_text_align=”center” header_3_font=”Oswald|||on|||||” header_3_font_size=”42px” header_3_letter_spacing=”2px” header_3_line_height=”1.5em” max_width=”600px” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”|||” locked=”off”]

Concept Clarity 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”texts” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Nunito||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”Oswald||||” header_font_size=”16px” header_letter_spacing=”2px” header_line_height=”1.7em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”600px” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-30px|||” custom_padding=”11px||1px|||”]

Playground Hospitality focuses on connecting the design, atmosphere, menus and procedures to deliver a consistent guest experience.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/what-weve-done/” button_text=”Explore How” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_border_color=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″ hover_enabled=”0″ global_module=”125″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Cormorant Garamond|500|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1e1e1e” header_2_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” animation_style=”fade”]

Meet Playground Hospitality’s Founder

Doug Roth

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#cccccc” divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ width=”80px”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

Doug founded Playground Hospitality to help clients pull together the thousand details that create a successful concept.

As the Playground manager, Doug has partnered with leading corporations to develop new dining concepts, improve existing operations and extend the life span of established restaurants. 

Over his 30-year hospitality career, Doug launched and operated dozens of highly profitable concepts and experienced the occasional stumble. That depth of experience keeps Playground Hospitality clients from making expensive mistakes.

A sought-after industry expert, Doug led the advisory board of the Tulane University Entrepreneurial Hospitality Program and guest lectured at Purdue University.

Tastes are Dynamic

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” max_width=”525px” module_alignment=”left” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_flip=”20%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%”]

We specialize in food that delights the eye and nourishes the soul.

Playground Hospitality menus treat guests to flavorful dishes with a healthful foundation.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/what-we-do/#restaurant_consulting” button_text=”Taste The Difference” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ button_icon_color=”#8300e9″ custom_margin=”24px|||||”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Feature 02 Area” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ background_color=”#453759″ custom_margin=”||180px|” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″ background_color=”#453759″ custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left” locked=”off”]

Craveable and Consistent

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”525px” module_alignment=”left” animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_flip=”20%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off”]

Playground Hospitality concepts reflect your brand personality through food, atmosphere and service. 

Our restaurants stand out and drive repeat guests in a competitive market.

Airwaves & Articles

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.5.1″ _module_preset=”default”]

20 Nov 2020

Potbelly Launches Another Turnaround

The chain must figure out its competitive advantage—a soul search it failed at during its last revamp—and translate that to the online ordering world. "You put your brand in the bag," says Doug Roth, founder and president of Chicago-based restaurant consultancy Playground Hospitality. "You need to be able to figure out how to do that."

Read More
24 Sep 2020

What will it take to make diners feel safe? Nearly 60% feel uneasy eating inside, so restaurants try sterilizing UV wands, tabletop air purifiers as winter looms.

Some restaurants are forgoing the headache of air quality investments and tent cities altogether and plan to ride out winter by focusing on carryout and delivery, said Doug Roth, president of restaurant consultancy Playground Hospitality.

Read More
04 Sep 2020

Chicago Restaurant Owners Lobby City to Raise Indoor Dining Capacity Before Weather Cools

The Illinois Restaurant Association has been lobbying the city of Chicago to raise indoor dining capacity from 25% to 50%, but that may not be enough to help some owners.

Read More
29 Jun 2020

Will America still go out to eat? One restaurateur’s moment of truth.

Since April, when 4 in 10 restaurants had closed their doors, some have reopened, propped up by a spray of federal dollars and, in some cases, rent reprieves from landlords, but they’re not yet on a firm footing.

Read More
21 Jun 2020

Restaurant Red Flags: How To Know Where To Dine Might Not Be Fine

Americans are on pace to set a new record for spending on dining out this year. To prepare for the massive restaurant crowd, Founder and President of Playground Hospitality Doug Roth joined the WBBM Noon Business Hour to discuss the red flags that could signal an eatery may not be up to snuff.

Listen Now
12 Jun 2020

Takeout gets a makeover: How COVID-19 is forcing restaurants to improve the to-go experience

Takeout pricing is even higher at some restaurants because of the additional costs of packaging and third-party delivery platforms

Read More
20 May 2020

Coronavirus: The Coming New Reality For Restaurants

What will the new reality be for restaurants? It’s going to be tough for many eateries to make a go of it, once restrictions are eased, says Doug Roth, founder and president of Playground Hospitality in Chicago. Initially, restaurants will not be able to reopen at full capacity.

Listen Now
19 May 2020

Even With Some Reopening, Industry Analyst Says Don’t Expect Restaurant Recovery Any Time Soon

Larger chains, fast casual restaurants, and Quick Service Restaurants have the best chances of surviving.

Listen Now

<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v15.0 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Restaurant & Hospitality Consultancy Based in Chicago</title>
<meta name="description" content="Playground Hospitality creates successful new dining concepts, improves existing operations and extends the life span of established restaurants." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://playgroundhospitality.com/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Restaurant & Hospitality Consultancy Based in Chicago" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Playground Hospitality creates successful new dining concepts, improves existing operations and extends the life span of established restaurants." />
